sen.j: 木下 延重（きのした のぶしげ、生没年不詳）は、安土桃山時代の武将。
sen.e: Nobushige KINOSHITA (date of birth and death unknown) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in Azuchi-Momoyama period.
Nobushige KINOSHITA (date of birth and death unknown) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in Azuchi-Momoyama period.
Nobushige KINOSHITA (date of birth and death unknown) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in Azuchi-Momoyama period.

sen.j: 官位は従五位下周防守。
sen.e: His official rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and he was Suo no kami (the governor of Suo Province.)
His official rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and he was Suo no kami (the governor of Suo Province.)
His official rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) and he was Suo no kami (the governor of Suo Province.)
His common name was Yoemon.
His common name was Yoemon.
His common name was Yoemon.

sen.j: 豊臣秀吉の鉄砲組頭として、小牧・長久手の戦いや小田原の役に従軍した。
sen.e: He took a part in campaigns of the Battle of Komaki and Nagakute and Odawara no eki (the Siege of Odawara) as the captain of the gun unit of Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI.
He took a part in campaigns of the Battle of Komaki and Nagakute and Odawara no eki (the Siege of Odawara) as the captain of the gun unit of Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI.
He took a part in campaigns of the Battle of Komaki and Nagakute and Odawara no eki (the Siege of Odawara) as the captain of the gun unit of Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI.

sen.j: 文禄の役には、鉄砲大将として海渡している。
sen.e: In the Bunroku campaign, he crossed the sea as the major captain of the gun unit.
In the Bunroku campaign, he crossed the sea as the major captain of the gun unit.
In the Bunroku campaign, he crossed the sea as the major captain of the gun unit.

sen.j: その後、文禄2年（1593年）12月から翌年にかけて、豊臣秀次の太閤検地として尾張国海東郡を担当。
sen.e: Then, from December 1593 to the next year, he took charge of survey in Kaito District in Owari Province of Taiko kenchi (the cadastral surveys) conducted by Hidetsugu TOYOTOMI.
Then, from December 1593 to the next year, he took charge of survey in Kaito District in Owari Province of Taiko kenchi (the cadastral surveys) conducted by Hidetsugu TOYOTOMI.
Then, from December 1593 to the next year, he took charge of survey in Kaito District in Owari Province of Taiko kenchi (the cadastral surveys) conducted by Hidetsugu TOYOTOMI.

sen.j: 慶長年間に播磨国内で2万石を領する。
sen.e: He possessed twenty thousand koku (crop yields) in Harima Province during Keicho era.
He possessed twenty thousand koku (crop yields) in Harima Province during Keicho era.
He possessed twenty thousand koku (crop yields) in Harima Province during Keicho era.

sen.j: 慶長5年（1600年）、関ヶ原の戦いでは西軍に与し、豊臣家の銃隊長として伏見城の戦いに参加した。
sen.e: In the Battle of Sekigahara in 1600, he belonged to the West squad and joined the battle in Fushimi-jo Castle as the captain of the gun unit of the TOYOTOMI family.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In the Battle of Sekigahara in 1600, he belonged to the West squad and joined the battle in Fushimi-jo Castle as the captain of the gun unit of the TOYOTOMI family.
In the Battle of Sekigahara in 1600, he belonged to the West squad and joined the battle in Fushimi-jo Castle as the captain of the gun unit of the TOYOTOMI family.

sen.j: 改易となり、その後の消息は不明。
sen.e: He forfeited his position and properties (Kaieki), and there was no further information about him since then.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He forfeited his position and properties (Kaieki), and there was no further information about him since then.
